casebody.data:
No. 71414 Supreme Court of Nevada. MARCH 15, 2018

US BANK, N.A., a National Banking Association, as Trustee for the Certificateholders of the Banc of America Mortgage Securities 2008-A Trust, Mortgage Pass-through Certificates, Series 2008-A, Appellant,
v.
SFR INVESTMENTS POOL 1, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company; and Alessi & Koenig, LLC, Respondents.

AFFIRMED.
